oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band (KVOO) - 1949-06-16
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: KVOO, Tulsa, OK radio program of Leon McAuliffe and his Western Swing Band (however Leon is away on a personal appearance), including Lee Keith (bandleader, trumpet), Jimmy Hall (vocals), and Morris Billington (piano). Originally broadcast 1949-06-16 at 12:15 pm (CST). Sponsored by Wat Henry, with announcer Walter Teas.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Western Swing Band (Leon McAuliffe)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Walter Teas) -- Opening theme (Steel Guitar Rag) -- Walter Teas introduces Lee Keith -- Down Yonder (Western Swing Band) -- Wat Henry commercial (Walter Teas) -- Green Light (Jimmy Hall vocals, Western Swing Band) -- Walter Teas and Lee Keith announce the band's appearance schedule -- Walter Teas introduces Morris Billington -- Marie (Morris Billington vocals, Western Swing Band) -- Walter Teas reads listener requests -- The Echo Of Your Footsteps (Jimmy Hall vocals, Western Swing Band) -- Wat Henry commercial (Walter Teas) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Walter Teas)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: KVOO (Radio station : Tulsa, Okla.); Teas, Walter; Western Swing Band (Musical group : Leon McAuliffe); Hall, Jimmy, 1921-; Billington, Morris; Keith, Lee (Musician)
